post.body: Stumbled across zeronet. 9hrs later its daylight again and I am still glued.

comment.body: @Pexo: I find it to be quite captivating.  I am interested in finding out how the network so to speak performs as popularity grows.

@Realjohndoe: I couldn't agree with you more. The hard part I find is keeping up with all the different networks from i2p, .onion , now we are establishing zeronet. Not to mention the countless other networks based on similar principles.  Particularly when I spend weeks diving into the code trying to understand the environment.  I have a few thoughts that I might better prepare and post later on how I would love to see this sort of networking progress in the future.
